messages.content:
can you simplify the language in this sentence? the logicic and grammar is confusing:
 The construction oversight team’s scope of work and budget will be developed by Party 2 prior to the start of the construction phase and will consist of a dedicated full time resident field engineer managed by WET and supported by specialty field engineers selected by the resident engineer as needed and selected staff from the design engineering consultant.

Party 2 will create the construction oversight team's work plan and budget before construction begins. This team will include a full-time field engineer in charge, who is managed by WET. The field engineer can choose additional specialty engineers and some staff from the design engineering consultant as needed.

can you also make the logic flow better here? keep thelanguage as similar as possible: Party 2 is responsible for submitting WET’s construction oversight scope of work and budget and it will be submitted to Party 1 for review and approval within one week of the date of submission.
Party 2 will submit WET's construction oversight scope of work and budget to Party 1 for review and approval. This submission must occur within one week of the submission date.
